Text:
Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

Also, thanks again for the Giga PACK upload. I've gotten a couple of movies out of that I had been wanting to see.

Cheers
Jon

@Jon: Be aware that this is Matroska container and not mp4 one. These are absolutely same video and audio tracks, with absolutely unchanged encoding - just muxing has been done to .mkv and not .mp4. Re-muxing (if needed) is simple procedure and needs ten seconds. It is my primary response to newest threats about moving my 272p movies to Handhelds 'cause I "do not belong here".
Well, I am not aware of any Matroska capable Handheld...

Thanks 20-40.
Sounds like a good one.

Why do they want your 272p encodings to be listed in Handhelds section? 

I watch your movie uploads in my 17 inch LCD monitor and is awesome.

Hi 20-40,
Not a problem with it being .mkv, I've got the apps to do the conversion easily.
If this is what you have to do to get around any [box] TPB wants to put you in then go for it.

Cheers
Jon

@ the_shroud - 20-40 has already released Unthinkable. You have to go to his GIGA Pack and follow instructions. The movie you want is in the 'non-upped 272p section'

Cheers
Jon

It's not that good... But for 332MB its superb...
Will giv a rating: A/V: 9/8
Movie: 8...
Thanks 4 the upload 20-forty...
